name: Today
short: Returns a random fact of what happened in history on today.
description: Returns a random fact of what happened in history on today.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
This cog displays a random history trivia fact or google doodle or calendar of today or for a specific day/month/year.
